data.title: 'Non-routine' jobs like health-care and construction are on the rise
data.text: Caroline Fairchild, LinkedIn managing news editor, joins 'The Exchange' to discuss the hiring slowdown and why 'non-routine' jobs, like electricians, plumbers and drivers, are on the rise.

data.title: Why Satya Nadella May Be Tech's Best CEO
data.text: There’s power in embracing technology that’s not your own.
